entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Gravenhurst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:40 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 4:00 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.7°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -8.5°C
Wind: S 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
